card.name: Inflation
card.description: Gain the {{ARTIFACT:38}} artifact and set its counter to 6. If you already have it, increase its counter by 6 instead.

description.now: Gain the {{ARTIFACT:38}} artifact and set its counter to 6. If you already have it, increase its counter by 6 instead.
description.prev: Increase the cost of all monsters in your hand by 1, and give them +2/+1.
